alert.note: Alert for Benton; Hickory (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 8:03PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN HICKORY AND SOUTHERN BENTON COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM CDT... At 803 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Warsaw, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Truman Lake, Warsaw, Preston, Cross Timbers, Knobby, Edwards, Fristoe and Whitakerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
